chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to a movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽齊彬老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: Hello, everyone.Welcome to English All Pass.My name is Kenneth Chee.歡迎收聽口說英語通。我是齊彬老師。In this unit, we are going to talk about a foreign culture or a country you would love to visit.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: Exercise 實戰演練

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: Let me start off by talking about why I like American culture.The biggest characteristic of the US culture is the fact that the United States is a melting pot.By that, I mean we can see various kinds of cultures mixed in one country.Also, the United States is the birthplace of so many great minds and great artists, such as Mark Twain, Thomas Edison,

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: and the Carpenters.I love their songs.What's most exciting is big cities like New York and Los Angeles are full of fun places and delicious American foods.Honestly, I seriously hope that pretty soon I will go to the United States and have some first-hand experiences there.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: I'm planning on visiting the United States someday.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 動詞叫做計劃,我們可以用 plan on something,計劃某件事或是 plan to do something,做某件事。I've always been interested in American culture.我一直對美國文化都非常的有興趣。這邊用 have always been 就是一直以來都是。在動詞時態上,我們用的是現在完成式,表示一直以來。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 我覺得好多好東西都是美國來的。可口可樂啦,Nike運動鞋啦,好事多啦。所以呢,我就想去。接著,進一步我們就可以來說明美國文化吸引我們的特點。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 美國文化的最大特點就是美國是一個大熔爐。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 下面哦,它是個名詞,就是特色特點。我們再來一次。這樣的劇情就表示是什麼樣的事實。後面加一個完整的子句。他說,A melting pot是文化熔爐的意思。Melting本來指的是融化的意思。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 我說這句話的意思是我們可以看到各種文化融合在一個國家裡面。這邊表達的是藉由這句話我的意思是

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 而且美國產出了許多很厲害的人,以及偉大的藝術家。像是馬克圖恩啊,愛迪生啊,或者是木槳兄妹。這邊的 birthplace of 意思是是什麼的出生地,就是產出很多的意思。那麼 great minds 直翻就是非常偉大的心指,就是這些人很有想法,很厲害。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 那麼接著他就舉了幾個人,像 Mark Twain,馬克圖恩,文學家,Thomas Edison,發明家愛迪生,以及 The Carpenters,木槳兄妹也有人翻成卡本特兄妹。他們的代表作 Every Sha La La La,那首歌有沒有,Yesterday Once More,往日重現這首歌了。我好愛他們的歌曲。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 他說更令人興奮的是,在紐約或者是洛杉磯這樣的大城市,充滿著有趣的地方,以及美味的美食食物。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 老實說,我真心的希望很快的我就可以去美國,而且能有親身的體驗啊。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 讓我用什麼來開始。這個句型常用在演講或者是講話的開場。看一下例子。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 我要說很高興見到大家。一開始我要感謝您的支持。首先,我要恭喜各位順利的完成你的課業。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 名詞,特性。名詞,大熔爐。形容詞,各種不同的,各式各樣的。動詞,使混合。名詞,出生地。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 副詞,嚴肅地,認真的。形容詞,第一手的,直接的。名詞,精力,閱歷。這個單元我們講的是,你想造訪的文化或是國家,希望您都學會了。最後請記得,每日十分鐘,讓您變成英語通。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通 Describe a foreign culture or country that you would love to visi
chunks.chunk_text: 我是齊彬老師, until then, see you next time!
